ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europa-Kommissionen, JRC – Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC-Geel har til hensigt at indgå en rammeaftale efter kaskademodellen vedrørende levering, installering og tilslutning af elfordelingstavler. Dette vil gøre det muligt for JRC-Geel at udskifte gamle eller ødelagte tavler.

MAIN_SITE.P: Europa-Kommissionen, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgien.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elfordelingstavler.

PLACE.P: Europa-Kommissionen, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgien.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europäische Kommission, Joint Research Centre (JRC), JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Die JRC-Geel beabsichtigt die Unterzeichnung eines Rahmenvertrags im Kaskadenverfahren für die Lieferung, die Installation und den Anschluss von Elektroverteilerkästen. Dies soll der JRC-Geel ermöglichen, alte oder defekte Kästen zu ersetzen.

MAIN_SITE.P: Europäische Kommission, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgien.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektroverteilerkästen.

PLACE.P: Europäische Kommission, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgien.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: European Commission, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC-Geel has the intention to sign a framework contract in cascade for the delivery, installation and connection of electrical distribution boards. This will allow JRC-Geel to replace old or broken boards.

MAIN_SITE.P: European Commission, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgium.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Electrical distribution boards.

PLACE.P: European Commission, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgium.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: General Court of the European Union

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Comisión Europea, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: El JRC de Geel tiene previsto celebrar un contrato marco en cascada para la entrega, la instalación y la conexión de cuadros de distribución eléctrica. Esto permitirá al JRC de Geel sustituir los cuadros viejos o deteriorados.

MAIN_SITE.P: Comisión Europea, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Bélgica.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Cuadros de distribución eléctrica.

PLACE.P: Comisión Europea, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Bélgica.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Euroopan komissio, Joint Research Centre (JRC), JRC.R – Resources, JRC.R.6 – Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Yhteisen tutkimuskeskuksen (JRC) Geelin-toimipaikassa aiotaan tehdä peräkkäisjärjestelmän mukainen puitesopimus sähkönjakelukeskusten toimituksesta, asennuksesta ja liittämisestä. Tämän avulla yhteisen tutkimuskeskuksen Geelin-toimipaikassa voidaan korvata vanhat tai rikkinäiset keskukset.

MAIN_SITE.P: Euroopan komissio, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Sopimuksen kohteena ovat sähkönjakelukeskukset.

PLACE.P: Euroopan komissio, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgia.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Commission européenne, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Le JRC de Geel envisage de conclure un contrat-cadre en cascade en vue de la livraison, de l'installation et du raccordement de tableaux de distribution électrique. Cela permettra au JRC de Geel de remplacer des tableaux anciens ou endommagés.

MAIN_SITE.P: Commission européenne, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgique.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tableaux de distribution électrique.

PLACE.P: Commission européenne, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgique.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Το JRC στο Geel προτίθεται να υπογράψει σύμβαση-πλαίσιο με διαδοχική σειρά για την παράδοση, εγκατάσταση και σύνδεση ηλεκτρικών πινάκων διανομής. Αυτό θα επιτρέψει στο JRC στο Geel να αντικαταστήσει παλιούς ή χαλασμένους πίνακες.

MAIN_SITE.P: Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Βέλγιο.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Ηλεκτρικοί πίνακες διανομής.

PLACE.P: Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Βέλγιο.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Commission europea, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Il JRC di Geel intende stipulare un contratto quadro con sistema a cascata per la consegna, l'installazione e la connessione di quadri di distribuzione elettrica. Ciò consentirà al JRC di Geel di sostituire i quadri vecchi o rotti.

MAIN_SITE.P: Commissione europea, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgio.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Quadri di distribuzione elettrica.

PLACE.P: Commissione europea, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgio.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europese Commissie, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC Geel is van plan een raamovereenkomst te sluiten volgens het cascadesysteem voor het leveren, installeren en aansluiten van elektrische verdeelborden. Op die manier kan het JRC Geel oude of kapotte borden vervangen.

MAIN_SITE.P: Europese Commissie, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, België.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektrische verdeelborden.

PLACE.P: Europese Commissie, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, België.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Comissão Europeia, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: O JRC de Geel pretende assinar um contrato-quadro em cascata para a entrega, instalação e ligação de quadros de distribuição elétrica. Tal permitirá ao JRC de Geel substituir quadros antigos ou danificados.

MAIN_SITE.P: Comissão Europeia, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Bélgica.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Quadros de distribuição elétrica.

PLACE.P: Comissão Europeia, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Bélgica.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europakommissionen, JRC - Joint Research Centre, JRC.R - Resources, JRC.R.6 - Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC i Geel har för avsikt att teckna ett ramavtal i kaskadform för leverans, installation och anslutning av elektriska fördelningscentraler. Detta kommer att göra det möjligt för JRC i Geel att byta ut gamla eller trasiga centraler.

MAIN_SITE.P: Europeiska kommissionen, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgien.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektriska fördelningscentraler.

PLACE.P: Europeiska kommissionen, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgien.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Evropská komise, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Středisko JRC v Geelu plánuje uzavřít rámcovou smlouvu s kaskádovým systémem na doručení, instalaci a připojení elektrických rozvodných panelů. To středisku JRC v Geelu umožní vyměnit staré a poškozené panely.

MAIN_SITE.P: Evropská komise, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgie.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektrické rozvodné panely.

PLACE.P: Evropská komise, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgie.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Euroopa Komisjon, Joint Research Centre (JRC), JRC.R – Resources, JRC.R.6 – Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Teadusuuringute Ühiskeskuse (JRC) Geeli üksus kavatseb sõlmida astmelise raamlepingu elektrijaotuskilpide kohaletoimetamise, paigaldamise ja ühendamise jaoks. See võimaldab JRC Geeli üksusel asendada vanad või katkised kilbid.

MAIN_SITE.P: Euroopa Komisjon, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektrijaotuskilbid.

PLACE.P: Euroopa Komisjon, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgia.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Európai Bizottság, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: A JRC-Geel lépcsőzetes rendszerű keretszerződést kíván aláírni elektromos elosztótáblák leszállítására, felszerelésére és csatlakoztatására vonatkozóan. A JRC-Geel ezáltal le tudja cserélni a régi vagy meghibásodott táblákat.

MAIN_SITE.P: Európai Bizottság, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgium.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektromos elosztótáblák.

PLACE.P: Európai Bizottság, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgium.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europos Komisija, JRC – Joint Research Centre, JRC.R – Resources, JRC.R.6 – Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC Gelyje ketina pasirašyti pakopinę preliminariąją sutartį dėl elektros skydinių pristatymo, įrengimo ir prijungimo. Tai leis JRC Gelyje pakeisti senas ar sugedusias skydines.

MAIN_SITE.P: Europos Komisija, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgija.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektros skirstomieji skydai.

PLACE.P: Europos Komisija, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgija.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Eiropas Komisija, Joint Research Centre (JRC), JRC.R – Resources, JRC.R.6 – Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kopīgā pētniecības centra (JRC) Gēlas struktūrvienība plāno noslēgt kaskādes veida pamatnolīgumu par elektrosadales paneļu piegādi, uzstādīšanu un pieslēgšanu. Tas nodrošinās veco vai bojāto paneļu nomaiņu JRC Gēlas struktūrvienībā.

MAIN_SITE.P: Eiropas Komisija, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre, Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Beļģija.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Elektrosadales paneļi

PLACE.P: Eiropas Komisija, Directorate-General: Joint Research Centre, Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Beļģija.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Il-Kummissjoni Ewropea, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Il-JRC ta' Geel għandu l-intenzjoni li jiffirma qafas ta' kuntratt f'ordni ta' prijorità għall-kunsinna, l-installazzjoni u l-konnessjoni ta' bords għad-distribuzzjoni tal-elettriku. Dan se jippermetti lill-JRC ta' Geel sabiex jibdel bords antiki jew miksurin.

MAIN_SITE.P: Il-Kummissjoni Ewropea, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, il-Belġju.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Komisja Europejska, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC Geel zamierza podpisać umowę ramową w systemie kaskadowym o dostawę, montaż i podłączenie elektrycznych tablic rozdzielczych. Dzięki temu możliwa będzie wymiana starych lub uszkodzonych tablic rozdzielczych w placówce JRC w Geel.

MAIN_SITE.P: Komisja Europejska, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC-Geel plánuje podpísať rámcovú zmluvu s kaskádovým systémom na doručenie, inštaláciu a pripojenie elektrických distribučných panelov. Vďaka tomu sa budú môcť v JRC-Geel vymeniť staré a poškodené panely.

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC Geel namerava podpisati okvirno pogodbo v kaskadi za dostavo, namestitev in priklop električnih razdelilnih plošč. To bo JRC Geel omogočilo zamenjavo starih ali pokvarjenih plošč.

MAIN_SITE.P: Evropska komisija, Directorate General: Joint Research Centre (JRC), Retieseweg 111, 2440 Geel, Belgija.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: An Coimisiún Eorpach, JRC — Joint Research Centre, JRC.R — Resources, JRC.R.6 — Resource Management Geel

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tá sé beartaithe ag JRC-Geel creatchonradh in ord tosaíochta a shíniú le haghaidh cláir dháileacháin leictreachais a sheachadadh, a shuiteáil agus a cheangal. Cuirfidh sé sin ar chumas JRC-Geel seanchláir nó cláir bhriste a athsholáthar.

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC Геел има намерението да подпише каскаден рамков договор за доставка, монтиране и свързване на електрически разпределителни табла. Това ще позволи на JRC Геел да подмени стари или повредени табла.

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC din Geel intenționează să semneze un contract-cadru în cascadă pentru livrarea, instalarea și racordarea de tablouri de distribuție electrică. Acest lucru va permite JRC din Geel să înlocuiască tablourile vechi sau defecte.

SHORT_DESCR.P: JRC-Geel namjerava potpisati okvirni ugovor u kaskadi za isporuku, ugradnju i priključivanje električnih razvodnih ploča. Time će se JRC-Geelu omogućiti zamjena starih ili pokvarenih ploča.
